properties.areaDesc: Greenup, KY; Lawrence, OH; Boyd, KY
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 15 at 8:26PM EST until February 16 at 6:17AM EST by NWS Charleston WV
properties.description:
...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Ohio...
Kentucky...

Ohio River At Ashland affecting Greenup, Boyd and Lawrence
Counties.

...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in Ohio...
Kentucky...

Ohio River At Greenup Lock affecting Greenup and Scioto Counties.

...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in Ohio...
Kentucky...West Virginia...

Ohio River At Point Pleasant affecting Gallia and Mason Counties.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Ohio River At Ashland.
* Until Sunday morning.
* At 8:00 PM EST Saturday the stage was 52.6 feet.
* Flood stage is 52.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring.
* Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending
at 8:00 PM EST Saturday was 54.6 feet.
* Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage just
after midnight tonight and continue falling to 36.3 feet Thursday
evening.
* Impact...At 52.0 feet, Minor flooding of roadways in low lying
areas due to backwater.

NWSheadline: The Flood Warning is now in effect until tomorrow morning
